DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine impact consume MREs sole source subsistence 21 day gut bacteria community composition gut health . Up 80 free-living adult randomize consume usual diet MREs 21 consecutive day . MREs provide Military Nutrition Division , US Army Research Institute Environmental Medicine ( USARIEM ) . Fecal , urine blood sample collect periodically , intervention measure gut barrier integrity , gut bacteria community composition , marker gut health , inflammation , nutritional status .
